<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4685</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Philosophy and Guidelines for Science Demonstrations</string>
            <string language="es">Filosofía y directrices para las demostraciones de Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Fealsúnacht agus Treoracha do Thaispeántais Eolaíochta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Philosophie und Korrekturlinien für Wissenschaft 
Demonstrationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Philosophie et directives pour des démonstrations
de la Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Filosofia e guidelines para demonstrações da 
ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Filosofia e guida di riferimento per le 
dimostrazioni di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φιλοσοφία και οδηγίες για τις επιδείξεις επιστήμης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">List of reasons explaining why chemistry class demonstrations are a good idea, plus guidelines for doing them safely.</string>
            <string language="es">Lista de motivos que explican porqué las demostraciones de la clase de química son una buena idea, junto con directrices para hacerlas de forma segura.</string>
            <string language="ga">Liosta fáthanna gur dea-smaointe iad taispeántais ranga ceimice, agus treoracha chun iad a dhéanamh go sábháilte.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liste der Gründe, die erklären, warum 
Chemieunterrichtdemonstrationen eine gute Idee sind, plus 
Korrekturlinien für sie sicher tun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liste de raisons expliquant pourquoi les 
démonstrations de classe de chimie sont une bonne idée, plus des 
directives pour les faire sans risque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lista das razões que explicam porque as 
demonstrações da classe de chemistry são uma idéia boa, mais 
guidelines para fazê-los com segurança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lista dei motivi che spiegano perchè le 
dimostrazioni del codice categoria di chimica sono una buona idea, 
più la guida di riferimento per farle sicuro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατάλογος λόγων που εξηγούν γιατί οι επιδείξεις 
κλάσης χημείας είναι μια καλή ιδέα, συν τις οδηγίες για να 
κάνουν τους ακίνδυνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
